promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi young mythical gecko fighting-type pokemon holding a white glaive. It can be found in arena-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fighting or gecko. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Glavizard, a a chibi young mythical gecko fighting-type pokemon. It can be found in arena-like environments It has the following abilities: Hasty Headbutt, Bellow. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "gecko", "fighting" or "Glavizard". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fighting-type pokemon, gecko-like, mythical, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, orange ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This elusive chibi reptile reigns as the spunky mini-champion of stadium worlds. Swift at delivering intense headbutts, its mighty bellow strikes awe.
